data.title: Good Neighborhood Bakery
data.text:
Sweet Themes Bakery is a great bakery. The decorated sugar cookies can be made to order, and they are so good! They are award willing and can be shipped. I am also a fan of their maple oat nut scones, coffee cakes and filled scones.
Their cakes are not only pretty, but they are really good. Sweet Themes Bakery is our choice for special occasion baked goods.

data.title: Excellent Eclairs...
data.text: Since moving to the area I've visited s number of bakeries that were super sugary or just plain bland... The Eclairs here are very generously sized and just plain good...

data.title: Great treats
data.text: This bakery is worth a stop! Great treats to go, or settle in with great tea or coffee and free wifi. I also ordered a birthday cake for my son - not only did it look fantastic but it was super yummy!!

data.title: Yummy treats for everyone!
data.text: Beautiful birthday cakes, cupcakes, cheesecake and cookies. They have sugar free options as well. They have just about every sweet treat imaginable. Their pecan bars are especially good as well as the carrot cake!

data.title: Nothing Sweet About This Bakery
data.text: They don't have anything so special that you can't get it somewhere else.  The few times I have been here I have been treated rudely by the staff (the owners, especially the female) their prices are expensive for the area and I will not be going back. Ever.

data.title: Great Decorative Cake Bakery
data.text: Had them do a small wedding cake - Hawaii themed.  They did a great job and the cake was very tasty as well as spot-on per the theme.  They were great to work with in the planning stage.  Staff very informative, very helpful and very friendly but also professional.  The only negative was that the cake was very expensive - over $500.00.  I don't have enough current knowledge to know if that was out of the ball park or not but the price did kind of take my breath away.  However, I state again - it was pretty and tasty and the exact colors/theme I asked for.  They did their job well.

data.title: Gourmet cupcakes
data.text: My go to place for desserts for special occasions and potlucks. Unique flavors of cupcakes and other pastries and custom cakes. Started by a former teacher  and her husband. Offers a rewards card for discounts.

data.title: Amazing Sugar Cookies
data.text: Sweet Themes bakery makes great cakes and pastries. My favorites are the amazing sugar cookies and maple oat nut scones. Sweet Themes also does custom cookie orders for parties, weddings, and company events.

data.title: YUM!
data.text: A bit on the pricey side but very yummy, fresh made treats! Staff is not super sweet but their treats are!

data.title: Beautiful creations that taste great! You must try the maple bacon roll!
data.text: Oh my goodness. If you have yet to visit Sweet Themes Bakery in downtown Kent, Washington, you are missing out. Their custom cookies are not only beautiful, but they taste great too. You absolutely must try the maple bacon roll. If you are a bacon lover, you will travel far and wide to continue to feast on these amazing treats. Nice atmosphere; good for small meetings or parties too.

data.title: Beautiful Cakes
data.text: I bought my mother's birthday cake there, a red velvet cake with cream cheese frosting. It was beautifully decorated with purple flowers. I think it's the most extravagant cake my 89 year old mother ever had. It was expensive, but who can put a price on gorgeous and delicious?

data.title: Refined bakery items with great selection
data.text: I enjoyed the selection available at Sweet Themes and was amazed by the flavor and texture of their pastries, cakes and cookies.  The staff are all very friendly and prompt in providing service.  The maple bacon doughnut here is delicious.

data.title: Macarons!
data.text: Because how many places can you special order this French treat in your favorite color for a party while enjoying a great cappuccino?

data.title: Wonderful Bakery
data.text: I ordered a quarter sheet cake for a family celebration we had yesterday. The cake was a huge success. I ordered a white cake with seedless raspberry filling and white American cream icing. The decorations were beautiful. Thanks Sweet Themes for another great cake.

data.title: Wide selection and great prices!
data.text:
Happened to stumble upon this place while in Kent this past weekend Feb 2016
Very large selection of breads and pastries -- cookies, brownies, cakes, macaroons, etc. 
Several interesting flavor combinations and the prices were fantastic. 
We ended up purchasing a couple brownies and about 6 cookies -- and it was under $10 for the lot. 
The cookies we purchased were 2@1.65 -- I thought $1.65 per cookie was a deal only to find out it was TWO for that price!
Highly recommend if you are in the area as the place had ample seating and the staff was super friendly -- not to mention because of the variety and prices were fantastic!

data.title: Great place for coffee and a pastery
data.text: Hours are mildly limited so check before going.  Great coffee and excellent deserts and pastries all made on the spot.  (Nice people, too!)

data.title: Amazing sweets!
data.text: If you want a specialized cake or cookies this is the place -- but it is also the place to stop if you just want a yummy treat! So glad to have them in downtown Kent!

data.title: Reviewing only the bakery
data.text: There were several of us getting dessert so I was able to try many different things. The selection is generous which can some times be a problem for a bakery at lunch. Everything we tried was wonderful, unique creations, fresh and the staff was very helpful in answering our questions so we could each choose just the right item.

data.title: Great Local Bakery
data.text: Sweet Themes Bakery is a great local Bakery in Kent, WA. We have gone to pick up a ready made cake that they stock in a cooler, pick up cookies, or order a special order cake, cupcakes or cookies. Their cakes and cupcakes are wonderful. We also like their different types of cookies; however, their frosted sugar cookies that can be special ordered in different shapes and sizes are the absolute best I have ever tasted. I had them make some for a baby shower and they were a hit! Kent is very lucky to have this Bakery in town. The cookies can be made for business and bagged individually.

data.title: Yummy Goodness
data.text: Their sugar cookies are delicious and they are beautifully decorated!  I have found it difficult to find a decent sugar cookie since my go to bakery closed a few years back.  I have found a sugar cookie that is now at the top of my list.  I highly recommend the lemon cookie with lemon frosting.
